translations: 小地毯，垫子；<英> （盖腿的）厚毯子，毛毯；<美，非正式>（男子的）遮秃假发；（马的）披毯，裹毯

sentences.sentence: The corners of the rug were curling up.
The rug adds a dash of colour to the room.
sentences.translation: 小地毯为房间增添了一点色彩。

sentences.sentence: It is not possible to reposition the rug without damaging it.
sentences.translation: 想要挪动地毯又不损坏它是不可能的。
